name: get_files_id_metadata
description: Retrieves all metadata for a given file.

file_id.description:
The unique identifier that represents a file.

The ID for any file can be determined
by visiting a file in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/files/123`
the `file_id` is `123`.

$block: A list of metadata instances that have been applied to a file or folder.

$ul: **entries**: A list of metadata instances, as applied to this file or folder.
